Package ohos.agp.animation

Class AnimatorVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.animation.Animator
      • ohos.agp.animation.AnimatorVector

  • public class AnimatorVector
extends Animator
    Creates a vector animator that implements the vector animation of a Component.
    Since:
    7

      • setDuration

        public AnimatorVector setDuration​(long duration)
        Sets the duration of an animator.
        Parameters:
        duration - Specifies the duration of an animator. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, in unit of milliseconds.
        Returns:
        Returns the current vector animator for continuous vector settings.

      • setDelay

        public AnimatorVector setDelay​(long startDelay)
        Sets the startup delay of an animator.
        Parameters:
        startDelay - Specifies the startup delay of an animator. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, in unit of milliseconds.
        Returns:
        Returns the current vector animator for continuous vector settings.

      • setCurveType

        public AnimatorVector setCurveType​(int curveType)
        Sets the interpolator used by an animator, which is a linear interpolator by default.
        Parameters:
        curveType - Specifies the curve type.
        Returns:
        Returns the current vector animator for continuous vector settings.
        See Also:
        Animator.CurveType

      • setLoopedCount

        public AnimatorVector setLoopedCount​(int loopedCount)
        Sets the repetition times of an animator.
        Parameters:
        loopedCount - Specifies the repetition times of an animator. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, or INFINITE. If the value is 0, the animator will be played only once.
        Returns:
        Returns the current vector animator for continuous vector settings.
        Since:
        7
        See Also:
        Animator.INFINITE

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation​(float value)
        Sets the variation for plane rotation of an animator. If both rotation and rotationBy are set, the latter will take effect.
        Parameters:
        value - Specifies the variation for plane rotation of an animator.
        Since:
        7
